abstract: Thin film solar technology companies are raising huge sums from venture investors, with SoloPower scoring the latest bundle of cash: $200 million.
snippet: Thin film solar technology companies are raising huge sums from venture investors, with SoloPower scoring the latest bundle of cash: $200 million.
lead_paragraph: UPDATED 7:24 p.m. to correct solar cost figures.

headline.main: Thin Film Solar Companies Raise Hundreds of Millions in Financing
